title: Autonomous Car Development
description: Designed and built a 1/8-scale autonomous vehicle with improved obstacle detection and navigation.

title: Robot Contest – Smart Locker Design
description: Engineered a space-saving robot with dual hook system and elevator pulley mechanism.

title: Clock Design and Fabrication
description: Built a precision clock mechanism demonstrating mechanical engineering principles.

title: Cannon Fabrication
description: Applied CNC and manual machining techniques to fabricate a working cannon.

title: Wooden Pen Fabrication
description: Crafted a custom wooden pen using lathe machining techniques.

title: Recipe Ratings Analysis and Prediction
description: Predicted recipe ratings using machine learning models on large datasets.

title: Signal Conditioning and Analysis
description: Enhanced system stability by designing signal conditioning circuits with Arduino and MATLAB.

title: Sentiment Analysis of Taylor Swift’s Lyrics
description: Performed sentiment and TF-IDF analysis on Taylor Swift's discography.

title: Heat Transfer Simulation and Control
description: Created an automated MATLAB-Arduino system for thermal simulations.

title: Acoustic Wave Spatiotemporal Analysis
description: Analyzed sound waves using a scanned microphone array and advanced averaging methods.

title: Material Strength Optimization (PMMA)
description: Optimized material strength-to-density ratios through finite element modeling.

title: Rectilinear Position Control System
description: Modeled and controlled a two-cart LTI system, improving settling time and overshoot.
